items.plant_description: The Peace Lily is a popular indoor plant known for its elegant, glossy leaves and white flowers. It thrives in low light conditions and helps purify the air.
items.plant_careTips: Keep the soil consistently moist ,Place in indirect sunlight.
items.plant_promotionalData: Buy two Peace Lilies and get 10% off your total purchase!

items.plant_description: The Snake Plant is a hardy, low-maintenance plant with tall, upright leaves. It's known for its air-purifying properties and ability to thrive in low light.
items.plant_careTips: Allow the soil to dry between waterings.

plant_reviews.comment: It's been months, and it still looks as vibrant as ever.

items.plant_promotionalData: Purchase a Snake Plant and receive a free ceramic pot!

items.plant_description: The Spider Plant is a classic choice for hanging baskets,with long,arching leaves adorned with tiny white flowers.Spider plants are great air purifiers and are safe for pets.
items.plant_careTips: Keep the soil evenly moist and provide bright sunlight.

plant_reviews.comment: My Spider Plant has produced so many 'babies'! It's incredibly rewarding to watch it thrive.

items.plant_promotionalData: Pre-order now and get 15% off your purchase!

items.plant_description: The Rubber Plant is a stunning indoor tree with large, glossy leaves that add a tropical touch to any room. It's relatively low-maintenance and grows well in bright, indirect light.
items.plant_careTips: Water when the top inch of soil is dry and wipe the leaves with a damp cloth to keep them dust-free.Rotate the plant occasionally for even growth.

plant_reviews.comment: My Rubber Plant is the centerpiece of my living room! It brings such a vibrant energy to the space.

items.plant_promotionalData: Purchase a Rubber Plant and receive a free watering can!

items.plant_description: One of the easiest varieties to grow as a houseplantâ€”it is affectionately called the beginner orchid.These blooms will open quicker in a warm indoor setting.
items.plant_careTips: Thrives in bright indirect light,but can tolerate medium indirect light.Direct sun tolerance is species dependant.Water every 1-2 weeks.

plant_reviews.comment: This came in a tight buble wrap.I love it.

items.plant_promotionalData: Buy two Peace Lilies and get 10% off your total purchase!

items.plant_description: The rose is a perennial flowering plant known for its beauty, fragrance, and cultural significance.Roses are cherished for their symbolism of love and romance and are used in perfumery,cosmetics and herbal medicine.
items.plant_promotionalData: Buy two Peace Lilies and get 10% off your total purchase!
